solution_line_template: His favorite player scored {total_points} total points that week because {game1_points} plus {game2_points} plus {game3_points} plus {game4_points} plus {game5_points} equals {total_points}
He averaged {average_points} points a game because {total_points} divided by {num_games} equals <<{total_points}/{num_games}={average_points}>>{average_points}.
He gets paid ${high_pay} because that's how much he gets if he averages 30 or more points that week.
